title: For Better - For Worse
creator_credit: John M. Bale, Don Anderson and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Dramatization of common misconceptions surrounding marriage and the types of stress contributing to marriage breakdown. Refers to alcohol, the consequences of “mateship” and violence.
